param.name: reference_source_selector
param.label: Will you select a reference genome from your history or use a built-in index?
param.help: Built-ins were indexed using default options. See `Indexes` section of help below
param.option: Use a genome from history and build index

validator.message: A built-in reference genome is not available for the build associated with the selected input file

param.name: ref_file
param.label: Use the following dataset as the reference sequence
param.help: You can upload a FASTA sequence to the history and use it as reference

param.name: configuration_switch
param.label: How do you want to configure manta?

param.name: minCandidateVariantSize
param.label: minCandidateVariantSize
param.help: Run discovery and candidate reporting for all SVs/indels at or above this size.

param.name: rnaMinCandidateVariantSize
param.label: rnaMinCandidateVariantSize
param.help: Separate option (to provide different default) used for runs in RNA-mode.

param.name: minEdgeObservations
param.label: minEdgeObservations
param.help: Remove all edges from the graph unless they're supported by this many 'observations'.

param.name: graphNodeMaxEdgeCount
param.label: graphNodeMaxEdgeCount
param.help: If both nodes of an edge have an edge count higher than this, then skip evaluation of the edge.

param.name: minCandidateSpanningCount
param.label: minCandidateSpanningCount
param.help: Run discovery and candidate reporting for all SVs/indels with at least this many spanning support observations.

param.name: minScoredVariantSize
param.label: minScoredVariantSize
param.help: After candidate identification, only score and report SVs/indels at or above this size.

param.name: minDiploidVariantScore
param.label: minDiploidVariantScore
param.help: Minimum VCF 'QUAL' score for a variant to be included in the diploid vcf.

param.name: minPassDiploidVariantScore
param.label: minPassDiploidVariantScore
param.help: VCF 'QUAL' score below which a variant is marked as filtered in the diploid vcf.

param.name: minPassDiploidGTScore
param.label: minPassDiploidGTScore
param.help: Minimum genotype quality score below which single samples are filtered for a variant in the diploid vcf.

param.name: minSomaticScore
param.label: minSomaticScore
param.help: Somatic quality scores below this level are not included in the somatic vcf.

param.name: minPassSomaticScore
param.label: minPassSomaticScore
param.help: Somatic quality scores below this level are filtered in the somatic vcf.

param.name: enableRemoteReadRetrievalForInsertionsInGermlineCallingModes
param.label: enableRemoteReadRetrievalForInsertionsInGermlineCallingModes
param.help: Remote read retrieval is used ot improve the assembly of putative insertions by retrieving any mate reads in remote locations with poor mapping quality. This feature can be enabled/disabled separately for germline and cancer calling below.

param.name: enableRemoteReadRetrievalForInsertionsInCancerCallingModes
param.label: enableRemoteReadRetrievalForInsertionsInCancerCallingModes
param.help: Here 'CancerCallingModes' includes tumor-normal subtraction and tumor-only calling. 'GermlineCallingModes' includes all other calling modes.

param.name: useOverlapPairEvidence
param.label: useOverlapPairEvidence
param.help: Set if an overlapping read pair will be considered as evidence. Set this value <= 0 to skip overlapping read pairs.
